Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel with noisy rooms”
Reviews.Author: paolapalma
Reviews.Content: I would not stay in this hotel when traveling to Rome, because it's not in the centre of the city (but close to the metro and bus station). But as I regularly visit my relatives, I chose it because it's very close to their place. The hotel is very nice, the team always kind. For a 2star hotel, you could not ask for more. The rooms are nice, but quite small. I've been to 4 or 5star hotels with less amenities in the room/bath room! Really very generous! The parking lot is totally convenient and the breakfast is what you can expect from a 2star in this price range. Unfortunately, the rooms are very noisy. You hear EVERY step outside, you hear doors, you hear showers, you hear eveything. I always ask for a room in the upper floors but they always manage to have only one in the first floor available. Big plus: Free Wireless Internet! All in all, a nice hotel certainly worth more than its 2star! I'll be back very soon. A double room usually costs around 110-120 Euros, breakfast included.

HotelInfo.Name: Arco di Travertino
HotelInfo.Address: Via Valgia Silvilla 71, 00181 Rome, Italy
